text: Hagi Anumzamofona anaga kaziga, serafimie nehaza ankeromo'za oti kagiza mani'nazage'na ke'noe. Ana ankeromokizmia 6si'a zamageko'na huzmantetere hu'nege'na zamage'noe. Hagi tare zamageko'naretira zamavugosa rufi'nete'za, tare zamageko'naretira zamagia refinete'za, tare zamageko'naretira ru tafratafra hu'za hare'za vano hu'naze.
